data.title: Tommy Tutone Tickets - 2024 Tour Dates
data.meta_description: Get Tommy Tutone Concert Tickets At TicketSmarter Today! Discover The Hottest Seats And Ticket Prices With Our Seating Chart.
data.text:
Tommy Tutone Concert Tickets

Sing along with one of the biggest ‘80s hits, and most phone numbers ever, with Tommy Tutone tickets. This band’s seminal hit “867-5309/Jenny” in 1981 has been a radio regular for more than three decades. Often considered a one-hit-wonder band, they charted with their first single “Angel Say No” a year before “Jenny” and have remained on and off again active since.

The band started in 1978 with primary members and founders Tommy Heath and Jim Keller. Heath is the only constant member throughout. They released three albums in their first iteration Tommy Tutone, Tommy Tutone 2, and National Emotion. The second album featured a smash hit they would be best known for throughout the decades. After a hiatus the band returned in 1996 with the album release of Nervous Love, then Tutone.rtf in 1998. The band signed with Spectra Records in 2007 and has released numerous singles under their banner.

Hear these ‘80s classics live with Tommy Tutone tickets. Along with their primary albums, there are also a handful of compilations, a live album and numerous single releases. Founding member Jim Keller also performs solo or with the Jim Keller band. He has also been the director of renowned musician Phillip Glass’s company, Dunvagen Music Publishers.

How much are Tommy Tutone tickets?

The average price of a Tommy Tutone concert ticket is around $97 per ticket. If you’re looking for cheap Tommy Tutone tickets, you’ll find better prices for cheap tickets in the upper levels furthest from the stage. Discount tickets that are farthest from the stage will typically be under $49. If you are looking for premium seating or VIP tickets, you can expect to pay over $150 per ticket in most cases.

When do Tommy Tutone tickets go on sale?

Typically, Tommy Tutone concert tour tickets go on sale 4-6 months prior to the performance and sometimes even a year in advance. Once the tour dates and concert schedule is announced, you can check our event calendar to find your perfect date and venue. Tommy Tutone concert tickets will typically be available within 24-48 hours of a tour announcement. There is never a need for a presale code. Why wait for the public on sale when you can secure your seats today.

Tommy Tutone 2024 Tour Dates

Tommy Tutone tour dates vary from year to year. In most cases, tours tend to be 6-12 months but can extend over multiple years especially if it is a final tour. Tommy Tutone concert schedule will typically have 25-50 tour dates.

There also can be a performance at music festivals across the country including Coachella, Lollapalooza and Bonnaroo Music Festival. Bonnaroo is held in Manchester, Tennessee. Coachella is held at Empire Polo Fields in Indio, California and Lollapalooza in the United States is held at Grant Park in Chicago, Illinois. It's easy to find seats to Tommy Tutone tour when you shop with us. Shopping with TicketSmarter even makes it easier to get into the venue. Our mobile transfer Tommy Tutone tour tickets let you skip past the box office line and head right for your seats.

Songs from the Tommy Tutone Tour Setlist

Tommy Tutone's setlist while performing in Alpharetta , GA at “Brooke Street Park” included the following songs:

When I'm Singing

Angel Say No

It Is What It Is

Operator (That's Not the Way It Feels)

Sylvia

Our Special Place

Wild World

Every Time That You Walk in the Room

867-5309/Jenny

Source: Setlist.fm
